name: System Under Surveillance
storyline:
After a suspicious car chase involving his adoptive mother, Adam finds himself alone in the middle of a dystopian city. He soon finds out that a mysterious governmental organization is after him, without knowing why.

While struggling to escape and survive, he finds a quirky cleaning robot labeled TURBO. Despite the name, TURBO is pretty clumsy and slow. Yet, with its big digital heart, the clumsy robot will accompany Adam in his journey, helping him discover the dark truth surrounding the accident.

COMIC-STYLE STORYTELLING
Savor the story through an interactive pixel art comic book. Explore the game, find secrets, and uncover the missing to reveal who caused the accident and why deadly robots are chasing you in this dystopian city.
summary: System Under Surveillance (SUS) is an upcoming stealth indie game with adventure and puzzle elements inspired by classic retro games. Take control of Adam and Turbo, and use their vastly different abilities to trick and avoid enemies. SUS is pure stealth at its core, and has no combat system!
